import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState={value:'1px solid black'};export var correctAnsBorder_Slice=createSlice({name:'correctAnsBorder',initialState:initialState,reducers:{increase_correctAnsBorder:function increase_correctAnsBorder(state){state.value='2px solid black';}}});// Action creators are generated for each case reducer function
